trans-unit.source: The <codeph>SimpleNetworkServerSample</codeph> program starts the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server, as well as the embedded driver, and waits for clients to connect.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>SimpleNetworkServerSample</codeph> program starts the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server, as well as the embedded driver, and waits for clients to connect.

target.mrk: The <codeph>SimpleNetworkServerSample</codeph> program starts the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server, as well as the embedded driver, and waits for clients to connect.

trans-unit.source: The program performs the following tasks.

seg-source.mrk: The program performs the following tasks.

target.mrk: The program performs the following tasks.

trans-unit.source: Starts the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server by using a property and also loads the embedded driver

target.mrk: Starts the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server by using a property and also loads the embedded driver

trans-unit.source: Determines if the Network Server is running

target.mrk: Determines if the Network Server is running

trans-unit.source: Creates the <codeph>NSSimpleDB</codeph> database if it is not already created

target.mrk: Creates the <codeph>NSSimpleDB</codeph> database if it is not already created

trans-unit.source: Tests the database connection by executing a sample query

seg-source.mrk: Tests the database connection by executing a sample query

target.mrk: Tests the database connection by executing a sample query

trans-unit.source: Allows client connections to connect to the server until you decide to stop the server and exit the program

target.mrk: Allows client connections to connect to the server until you decide to stop the server and exit the program

trans-unit.source: Shuts down the Network Server before exiting the program

seg-source.mrk: Shuts down the Network Server before exiting the program

target.mrk: Shuts down the Network Server before exiting the program
